txt.en: '...and then my dad says to stay away from that minstrel, cause no good'll come of it! Can you believe that?'
'I don't know what to wear to the dance... my green dress or the blue. I know it's some time off, but Padric should see me at my best.'
'Yes, yes, coming along nicely, very nicely indeed.'
'Someday I'm going to move to Michel Delving and leave all this behind.'
'So I told her she can be that way if she likes, but she won't sup with us if she's going to be like that! Then we got up and left.'
'If you're going to head down Michel Delving way, best to bring extra coin. There are so many treats to buy there!'
'You tell your Inn League friends to pay up!'
'These copies of my recipe don't grow on trees, you know.'
'Hmmm, not ready yet, soon though... soon!'
'Still not ready... I wonder what's taking so long.'
'Ah, soon I'll be able to fill this order and make my fortune from those high poppies in Michel Delving.'
